data.text: @swapcoolkarni @richapintoi Must wear mask but no fine. As per above notice but this is for Raigad. Let's see for Mumbai.
@shanpati @richapintoi So masks are no longer compulsory in Mumbai???
@richapintoi Madame Ji , Maybe Mumbaikars are observing it more judiciously . My daily experience in the evening  at Marine drive is pleasant
@richapintoi This will trigger another wave if maskless drive is slowed down
@richapintoi When situation is normal, people portray lax behaviour and this has cost us before. Hoping things remain normal.
@richapintoi This is inspite of you seeing more and more people without masks now.
